snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes a third online publishing tool from the founders of Twitter and Blogger and musings on the possible design of the...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday's selection includes a third online publishing tool from the founders of Twitter and Blogger and musings on the possible design of the iPad Mini.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Twitter Founders' Trifecta and Thoughts on the iPad Mini
